name: The End of the Line
paragraphs: You quickly realize that jumping out of the window was not the smartest idea. You fall straight to the ground and hit it hard. You can hear bones breaking, and everything goes dark.

When you wake up, you're in a hospital bed, surrounded by doctors and nurses. You try to speak, but your body is broken beyond repair. The doctors tell you that you have only a few minutes left to live. As you take your last breath, you think about the strange occurrences that led you to this point. You wonder what would have happened if you had made different choices along the way. The end of the line has come for you, and there's no turning back.
